file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  description: '"Use these endpoints for interacting with Blog Posts, Blog Authors,
    and Blog Tags"'
  title: Blog Post endpoints
  version: v3
servers:
- url: https://api.hubapi.com/
tags:
- name: Blog_Post
paths:
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts:
    get:
      description: |
        Get the list of blog posts. Supports paging and filtering. This method would be useful for an integration that examined these models and used an external service to suggest edits.
      operationId: get-/cms/v3/blogs/posts_getPage
      parameters:
      - description: Only return Blog Posts created at exactly the specified time.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: createdAt
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return Blog Posts created after the specified time.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: createdAfter
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return Blog Posts created before the specified time.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: createdBefore
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return Blog Posts last updated at exactly the specified
          time.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: updatedAt
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return Blog Posts last updated after the specified time.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: updatedAfter
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Only return Blog Posts last updated before the specified time.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: updatedBefore
        required: false
        schema:
          format: date-time
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields
          are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt`
          will be used by default.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: sort
        required: false
        schema:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        style: form
      - description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can
          get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response
          containing more results.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: after
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        style: form
      - description: Specifies whether to return archived Blog Posts. Defaults to
          `false`.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: archived
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CollectionResponseWithTotalBlogPostForwardPaging'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Get all Blog Posts
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
    post:
      description: Create a new Blog Post.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts_create
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
        description: The JSON representation of a new Blog Post.
        required: true
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Create a new Blog Post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/archive:
    post:
      description: |-
        Delete the Blog Post objects identified in the request body.
        Note: This is not the same as the in-app `archive` function. To perform an in-app `archive` send an normal update with the `archived` field set to true.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/archive_archiveBatch
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchInputString'
        description: The JSON array of Blog Post ids.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Archive a batch of Blog Posts
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/create:
    post:
      description: Create the Blog Post objects detailed in the request body.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/create_createBatch
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchInputBlogPost'
        description: The JSON array of new Blog Posts to create.
        required: true
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchResponseBlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        "207":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchResponseBlogPostWithErrors'
          description: multiple statuses
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Create a batch of Blog Posts
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/read:
    post:
      description: Retrieve the Blog Post objects identified in the request body.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/read_readBatch
      parameters:
      - description: Specifies whether to return archived Blog Posts. Defaults to
          `false`.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: archived
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
        style: form
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchInputString'
        description: The JSON array of Blog Post ids.
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchResponseBlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        "207":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchResponseBlogPostWithErrors'
          description: multiple statuses
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Retrieve a batch of Blog Posts
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/update:
    post:
      description: Update the Blog Post objects identified in the request body.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/update_updateBatch
      parameters:
      - description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: archived
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
        style: form
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchInputJsonNode'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchResponseBlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        "207":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchResponseBlogPostWithErrors'
          description: multiple statuses
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Update a batch of Blog Posts
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/clone:
    post:
      description: Clone a Blog.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/clone_clone
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContentCloneRequestVNext'
        description: The JSON representation of the ContentCloneRequest object.
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Clone a Blog Post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/schedule:
    post:
      description: Schedule a Blog Post to be Published.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/schedule_schedule
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContentScheduleRequestVNext'
        description: The JSON representation of the ContentCloneRequestVNext object.
        required: true
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Schedule a Blog Post to be Published
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}:
    delete:
      description: Delete the Blog Post object identified by the id in the path.
      operationId: delete-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}_archive
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: archived
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
        style: form
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Delete a Blog Post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
    get:
      description: Retrieve the Blog Post object identified by the id in the path.
      operationId: get-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}_getById
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Specifies whether to return archived Blog Posts. Defaults to
          `false`.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: archived
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Retrieve a Blog Post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
    patch:
      description: |
        Sparse updates a single Blog Post object identified by the id in the path.
        All the column values need not be specified. Only the that need to be modified can be specified.
      operationId: patch-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}_update
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Specifies whether to update archived Blog Posts. Defaults to
          `false`.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: archived
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
        style: form
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
        description: The JSON representation of the updated Blog Post.
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Update a Blog Post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/draft:
    get:
      description: Retrieve the full draft version of the Blog Post.
      operationId: get-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/draft_getDraftById
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Retrieve the full draft version of the Blog Post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
    patch:
      description: |
        Sparse updates the draft version of a single Blog Post object identified by the id in the path.
        All the column values need not be specified. Only the that need to be modified can be specified.
      operationId: patch-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/draft_updateDraft
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
        description: The JSON representation of the updated Blog Post to be applied
          to the draft.
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Update a Blog Post draft
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/draft/push-live:
    post:
      description: Take any changes from the draft version of the Blog Post and apply
        them to the live version.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/draft/push-live_pushLive
      parameters:
      - description: The id of the Blog Post for which it's draft will be pushed live.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Push Blog Post draft edits live
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/draft/reset:
    post:
      description: Discards any edits and resets the draft to the live version.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/draft/reset_resetDraft
      parameters:
      - description: The id of the Blog Post for which it's draft will be reset.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          content: {}
          description: No content
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Reset the Blog Post draft to the live version
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions:
    get:
      description: Retrieves all the previous versions of a blog post.
      operationId: get-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions_getPreviousVersions
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can
          get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response
          containing more results.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: after
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - explode: true
        in: query
        name: before
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CollectionResponseWithTotalVersionBlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Retrieves all the previous versions of a blog post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions/{revisionId}:
    get:
      description: Retrieves a previous version of a blog post.
      operationId: get-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions/{revisionId}_getPreviousVersion
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: The Blog Post version id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: revisionId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VersionBlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Retrieves a previous version of a blog post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions/{revisionId}/restore:
    post:
      description: Takes a specified version of a blog post and restores it.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions/{revisionId}/restore_restorePreviousVersion
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: The Blog Post version id to restore.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: revisionId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Restore a previous version of a blog post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
  /cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions/{revisionId}/restore-to-draft:
    post:
      description: Takes a specified version of a blog post, sets it as the new draft
        version of the blog post.
      operationId: post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions/{revisionId}/restore-to-draft_restorePreviousVersionToDraft
      parameters:
      - description: The Blog Post id.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: objectId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: The Blog Post version id to restore.
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: revisionId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlogPost'
          description: successful operation
        default:
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: An error occurred.
      security:
      - hapikey: []
      - oauth2_legacy:
        - content
      summary: Restore a previous version of a blog post, to the draft version of
        the blog post
      tags:
      - Blog_Post
components:
  responses:
    Error:
      content:
        '*/*':
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
      description: An error occurred.
  schemas:
    Angle:
      example:
        units: deg
        value: 7.386281948385884
      properties:
        value:
          type: number
        units:
          enum:
          - deg
          - grad
          - rad
          - turn
          type: string
      required:
      - units
      - value
      type: object
    BackgroundImage:
      example:
        imageUrl: imageUrl
        backgroundSize: backgroundSize
        backgroundPosition: TOP_LEFT
      properties:
        imageUrl:
          type: string
        backgroundSize:
          type: string
        backgroundPosition:
          enum:
          - TOP_LEFT
          - TOP_CENTER
          - TOP_RIGHT
          - MIDDLE_LEFT
          - MIDDLE_CENTER
          - MIDDLE_RIGHT
          - BOTTOM_LEFT
          - BOTTOM_CENTER
          - BOTTOM_RIGHT
          type: string
      required:
      - backgroundPosition
      - backgroundSize
      - imageUrl
      type: object
    BatchInputBlogPost:
      example:
        inputs:
        - publishDate: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
          language: af
          enableLayoutStylesheets: true
          metaDescription: metaDescription
          attachedStylesheets:
          - key: '{}'
          - key: '{}'
          createdAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
          password: password
          htmlTitle: htmlTitle
          publishImmediately: true
          id: id
          state: state
          slug: slug
          createdById: createdById
          updatedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
          rssBody: rssBody
          contentTypeCategory: "0"
          mabExperimentId: mabExperimentId
          published: true
          updatedById: updatedById
          translatedFromId: translatedFromId
          folderId: folderId
          widgetContainers:
            key: '{}'
          pageExpiryRedirectId: 5
          deletedAt: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
          featuredImage: featuredImage
          authorName: authorName
          domain: domain
          name: name
          dynamicPageHubDbTableId: dynamicPageHubDbTableId
          campaign: campaign
          enableDomainStylesheets: true
          includeDefaultCustomCss: true
          subcategory: subcategory
          layoutSections:
            key:
              cssStyle: cssStyle
              label: label
              type: type
              params:
                key: '{}'
              rows:
              - {}
              - {}
              rowMetaData:
              - cssClass: cssClass
                styles:
                  backgroundColor:
                    a: 4.145608029883936
                    r: 9
                    b: 2
                    g: 3
                  flexboxPositioning: TOP_LEFT
                  backgroundImage:
                    imageUrl: imageUrl
                    backgroundSize: backgroundSize
                    backgroundPosition: TOP_LEFT
                  forceFullWidthSection: true
                  verticalAlignment: TOP
                  maxWidthSectionCentering: 1
                  backgroundGradient:
                    angle:
                      units: deg
                      value: 7.386281948385884
                    sideOrCorner:
                      horizontalSide: LEFT
                      verticalSide: TOP
                    colors:
                    - color:
                        a: 4.145608029883936
                        r: 9
                        b: 2
                        g: 3
                    - color:
                        a: 4.145608029883936
                        r: 9
                        b: 2
                        g: 3
              - cssClass: cssClass
                styles:
                  backgroundColor:
                    a: 4.145608029883936
                    r: 9
                    b: 2
                    g: 3
                  flexboxPositioning: TOP_LEFT
                  backgroundImage:
                    imageUrl: imageUrl
                    backgroundSize: backgroundSize
                    backgroundPosition: TOP_LEFT
                  forceFullWidthSection: true
                  verticalAlignment: TOP
                  maxWidthSectionCentering: 1
                  backgroundGradient:
                    angle:

      properties:
        id:
          description: The unique ID of the Blog Post.
          type: string
        slug:
          description: The path of the this blog post. This field is appended to the
            domain to construct the url of this post.
          type: string
        contentGroupId:
          description: The ID of the parent Blog this Blog Post is associated with.
          type: string
        campaign:
          description: The GUID of the marketing campaign this Blog Post is a part
            of.
          type: string
        categoryId:
          description: ID of the type of object this is. Should always .
          format: int32
          type: integer
        state:
          description: An ENUM descibing the current state of this Blog Post.
          maxLength: 25
          type: string
        templatePath:
          type: string
        name:
          description: The internal name of the blog post.
          type: string
        mabExperimentId:
          type: string
        archived:
          description: If True, the post will not show up in your dashboard, although
            the post could still be live.
          type: boolean
        authorName:
          description: The name of the user that updated this blog post.
          type: string
        abTestId:
          type: string
        createdById:
          description: The ID of the user that created this blog post.
          type: string
        updatedById:
          description: The ID of the user that updated this blog post.
          type: string
        domain:
          description: The domain this Blog Post will resolve to. If null, the Blog
            Post will default to the domain of the ParentBlog.
          type: string
        subcategory:
          type: string
        abStatus:
          enum:
          - master
          - variant
          - loser_variant
          - mab_master
          - mab_variant
          - automated_master
          - automated_variant
          - automated_loser_variant

            type: integer
          type: array
        postBody:
          description: The HTML of the main post body.
          type: string
        postSummary:
          description: The summary of the blog post that will appear on the main listing
            page.
          type: string
        rssBody:
          description: The contents of the RSS body for this Blog Post.
          type: string
        rssSummary:
          description: The contents of the RSS summary for this Blog Post.
          type: string
        enableGoogleAmpOutputOverride:
          description: Boolean to allow overriding the AMP settings for the blog.
          type: boolean
        htmlTitle:
          description: The html title of this Blog Post.
          type: string
        pageRedirected:
          type: boolean
        pageExpiryEnabled:
          type: boolean
        pageExpiryDate:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        pageExpiryRedirectId:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        pageExpiryRedirectUrl:
          type: string
        useFeaturedImage:
          description: Boolean to determine if this post should use a featuredImage.
          type: boolean
        password:
          description: Set this to create a password protected page. Entering the
            password will be required to view the page.
          type: string
        attachedStylesheets:
          description: List of stylesheets to attach to this blog post. These stylesheets
            are attached to just this page. Order of precedence is bottom to top,
            just like in the HTML.
          items:
            additionalProperties:
              properties: {}
              type: object
            type: object
          type: array
        includeDefaultCustomCss:
          description: Boolean to determine whether or not the Primary CSS Files should
            be applied.
          type: boolean
        enableDomainStylesheets:
          description: Boolean to determine whether or not the styles from the template
            should be applied.
          type: boolean
        enableLayoutStylesheets:
          description: Boolean to determine whether or not the styles from the template
            should be applied.
          type: boolean
        metaDescription:
          description: A description that goes in <meta> tag on the page.
          type: string
        publishImmediately:
          description: Set this to true if you want to be published immediately when
            the schedule publish endpoint is called, and to ignore the publish_date
            setting.
          type: boolean
        headHtml:
          description: Custom HTML for embed codes, javascript, etc. that goes in
            the <head> tag of the page.
          type: string
        footerHtml:
          description: Custom HTML for embed codes, javascript that should be placed
            before the </body> tag of the page.
          type: string
        contentTypeCategory:
          description: An ENUM descibing the type of this object. Should always be
            BLOG_POST.
          enum:
          - "0"
          - "1"
          - "2"
          - "3"
          - "4"
          - "5"
          - "6"
          - "7"
          type: string
        currentState:

            Should always match state.
          enum:
          - AUTOMATED
          - AUTOMATED_DRAFT
          - AUTOMATED_SENDING

          - PROCESSING

          - AUTOMATED_DRAFT_AB
          - AUTOMATED_DRAFT_ABVARIANT
          - AUTOMATED_LOSER_ABVARIANT
          type: string

          description: Optional override to set the URL to be used in the rel=canonical
            link tag on the page.
          type: string
        featuredImage:
          description: The featuredImage of this Blog Post.
          type: string
        featuredImageAltText:
          description: Alt Text of the featuredImage.
          type: string
        publicAccessRulesEnabled:
          description: Boolean to determine whether or not to respect publicAccessRules.
          type: boolean
        publicAccessRules:
          description: Rules for require member registration to access private content.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/PublicAccessRule'

          additionalProperties:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/LayoutSection'
          type: object
        themeSettingsValues:

          format: date-time
